content: NEW YORK  July 30 U.S. refiners like Valero Energy Corp are running plants at full tilt  squeezing the remaining dollars from stronger-than-expected surge in gasoline demand before the busy summer season is replaced by the chill of winter  executives said on Thursday.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: U.S. refiners squeeze out last drops of gasoline before winter

content: U.S. refiner Valero Energy Corp  reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as its refining margins rose due to a steep fall in crude oil prices.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Valero Energy profit beats estimates as refining margins rise

content: July 30 U.S. refiner Valero Energy Corp  reported a better-than-expected quarterly profit as its refining margins rose due to a steep fall in crude oil prices.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Valero Energy profit beats estimates as refining margins rise

content: July 30 U.S. refiner Valero Energy Corp's  quarterly profit more than doubled as refining margins rose due to a steep fall in oil prices.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Refiner Valero Energy's quarterly profit doubles

content: NEW YORK  July 14 Valero Energy Corp  one of the biggest U.S. oil refiners  is preparing to sell ethanol for export for the first time  the company said  betting on the $2 billion overseas market as U.S. demand remains plagued by political uncertainty.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: RPT-Valero expands into ethanol export market for 1st time

content: NEW YORK  July 14 Valero Energy Corp  one of the biggest U.S. oil refiners  is preparing to sell ethanol for export for the first time  the company said  betting on the $2 billion overseas market as U.S. demand remains plagued by political uncertainty.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Valero expands into ethanol export market for 1st time

content: HOUSTON Valero Energy Corp was preparing to restart production units at its 180 000 barrel per day (bpd) Memphis  Tennessee  refinery  which was hit by a power interruption on Sunday  sources familiar with plant operations said.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Valero preparing to restart Memphis refinery -sources

content: SINGAPORE  May 13 Asian jet fuel shipments to the United States West Coast region could pick up this month as a prolonged cut in throughput at a California refinery is drawing down inventories  traders said on Wednesday.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Asian jet fuel shipments to US West Coast to pick up in May - traders

content: SAN ANTONIO  April 30 Valero Energy Corp  is taking advantage of low oil prices to aggressively build out its refining and logistical assets  but new acquisitions are not planned  Chief Executive Joe Gorder said at the company's annual shareholders meeting on Thursday.

title: Valero CEO sees growth  but not acquisitions

content: TORONTO  March 10 The two oil trains that derailed and burst into flames in recent weeks in northern Ontario were both carrying synthetic crude to Valero Energy Corp's refinery near Quebec City  the U.S.-based company said on Tuesday.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Trains in Canada derailments carried synthetic crude for Valero

content: U.S. refiners Valero Energy Corp  and Phillips 66  reported better-than-expected quarterly profits as they processed more cheap crude oil amid buoyant demand for gasoline.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Cheap crude helps Valero  Phillips 66 profits beat estimates

content: Jan 29 U.S. refiners Valero Energy Corp  and Phillips 66 reported better-than-expected quarterly profits as they processed more cheap crude oil amid buoyant demand for gasoline.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Cheap crude helps Valero  Phillips 66 profits beat estimates

content: Jan 29 U.S. refiner Valero Energy Corp  reported a 5 percent fall in quarterly income  hurt by a narrower spread between Brent and WTI crude and a drop in operating profit at its ethanol business.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Refiner Valero Energy's profit falls 5 pct

content: HOUSTON  Jan 28 Valero Energy Corp  Chairman and Chief Executive Joe Gorder said on Wednesday low oil prices are encouraging continued global demand for refined products like motor fuels gasoline and diesel.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Valero CEO says low oil prices encourage global fuel demand

content: HOUSTON Valero Energy Corp expects to complete giant tanks at its Corpus Christi  Texas  refinery in the first half of 2015 to hold crude for export to the company's 265 000 barrel per day (bpd) refinery in Quebec  according to an investor presentation posted on the Valero website on Tuesday.
name: Valero Energy Corporation
title: Valero to complete Corpus Christi export tanks in 2015 first half
